column1: #Text=Polycrystalline SmFe0.5Mn0.5O3 samples were produced by the combustion reaction method [29].

#Text=A solution containing the stoichiometric quantity of high quality grade reagents Sm(NO3)3.6H2O (Aldrich 99.98%), MnCl2:4H2O (Aldrich 99%) and Fe(NO3)3.9H2O (Aldrich; 99.9%) was formed by diluting them in distilled water.
#Text=The solution was subjected to vigorous stirring with a magnetic stirrer at temperature about 120 °C for 1 h in order to remove water excess.
#Text=During the stirring and evaporation process a stoichiometric amount of urea organic fuel, calculated according to propellants chemistry, was added [30].
